vista.graph
Class LegendItem

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GraphicElement
      vista.graph.GEContainer
          vista.graph.LegendItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Animate, Bounded, BoundedComposite, Composite, Drawable, DrawableComposite, FontResizable, Layoutable, ScaledElement
public class LegendItem
extends GEContainer
implements ScaledElement

A legend item for each Curve on the Plot consisting of a LineElement and associated TextLine. The GELineLayout is used for managing layout

Version:
$Id: LegendItem.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:04 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
